item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】PACK - Chiquititas (Tiny Angels) | DISCOGRAPHY [ARGENTINA] 1995 - 2001 [ALAC 16Bit/44.1kHz] 11 albums
item.description:
Before we start, I am searching for the Israel exclusive album in hebrew language (the live show songs), if you have a copy in lossless or lossy please send it to me on private message, thank you!! I’ll learn hebrew soon


CHiQUiTiTAS (known as TiNY ANGELS in the U.K., Africa & Middle East) was a huge hit argentinian youth telenovela produced by Cris Morena, a now jury of the Latin Grammy’s Recording Academy, she wrote all the songs from all these albums. Chiquititas had 7 seasons with more than 1000 episodes and sold more than 10 million records. It also has many remakes in countries like Brazil, Portugal, Mexico, Israel and more, with all the songs from these albums dubbed in their respective language. It was broadcasted in more than 50 countries all around the globe, in Latin America it became popular after being broadcasted on Cartoon Network and Boomerang. Later Disney Channel produced the last season in 2006 with a new cast.
The telenovela was and still is huge in Israel, 4 members of the cast became a successful pop group known as ERREWAY

All the albums are sung by original members of the cast featuring an argentinian kids chorus called “CORO KENNEDY”
THE FOLDER CONTAINS:

VOLUMES 1-7
THE MOVIE SOUNDTRACK (Rincón de Luz) [in 128kbps MP3 only]
CHRISTMAS SONGS - EP
LIVE AT THE GRAN REX TEATHER - EP

ENJOY!
Hidden Content:
You must reply before you can see the hidden data contained here.
